languages.text: "Продам местечко в очереди — спешите приобщиться к благословенной Капитанской похлебке! Придает сил, недуги снимает, здоровыми будете как Лорд-капитан!"

"Don't miss out on a chance to taste the blessed broth enjoyed by the Lord Captain! Boost your strength! Cure your ailments! Be as hale as the Lord Captain! Get a place in the queue for a reasonable price!"
languages.original_text: "Продам местечко в очереди — спешите приобщиться к благословенной Капитанской похлебке! Придает сил, недуги снимает, здоровыми будете как Лорд-капитан!"

traits.locale_text: "Don't miss out on a chance to taste the blessed broth enjoyed by the Lord Captain! Boost your strength! Cure your ailments! Be as hale as the Lord Captain! Get a place in the queue for a reasonable price!"

languages.text: «¡No dejen pasar la oportunidad de probar el caldo sagrado que disfrutó nuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán! ¡Potencien su fuerza! ¡Curen sus enfermedades! ¡Vuélvanse tan robustos como {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán! ¡Pónganse a la cola por un precio razonable!».
languages.original_text: "Don't miss out on a chance to taste the blessed broth enjoyed by the Lord Captain! Boost your strength! Cure your ailments! Be as hale as the Lord Captain! Get a place in the queue for a reasonable price!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No dejen pasar la oportunidad de probar el caldo sagrado que disfrutó nuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán! ¡Potencien su fuerza! ¡Curen sus enfermedades! ¡Vuélvanse tan robustos como {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán! ¡Pónganse a la cola por un precio razonable!».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン御用達の祝福のスープを味わうチャンスを逃さないで！力を高めよ！病気を治せ！ロード・キャプテンのように元気になろう！列に並んで安いお値段で買おう！」
languages.original_text: "Don't miss out on a chance to taste the blessed broth enjoyed by the Lord Captain! Boost your strength! Cure your ailments! Be as hale as the Lord Captain! Get a place in the queue for a reasonable price!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン御用達の祝福のスープを味わうチャンスを逃さないで！力を高めよ！病気を治せ！ロード・キャプテンのように元気になろう！列に並んで安いお値段で買おう！」

languages.text: “这汤可是舰长大人亲自享用过的！不要错过这个机会！喝了这个汤，就能变得身强体壮！还能治好小病小灾！快来变得像舰长大人一样所向披靡吧！只要付个合理的价钱，就可以来这边排队！”
languages.original_text: "Don't miss out on a chance to taste the blessed broth enjoyed by the Lord Captain! Boost your strength! Cure your ailments! Be as hale as the Lord Captain! Get a place in the queue for a reasonable price!"

traits.locale_text: “这汤可是舰长大人亲自享用过的！不要错过这个机会！喝了这个汤，就能变得身强体壮！还能治好小病小灾！快来变得像舰长大人一样所向披靡吧！只要付个合理的价钱，就可以来这边排队！”

languages.text: "Versäumt nicht die Gelegenheit, die gesegnete Brühe zu probieren, die auch der Lord Captain genossen hat! Stärkt Euch! Heilt Eure Krankheiten! Werdet so gesund wie der Lord Captain! Sichert Euch für einen vernünftigen Preis einen Platz in der Schlange!"
languages.original_text: "Don't miss out on a chance to taste the blessed broth enjoyed by the Lord Captain! Boost your strength! Cure your ailments! Be as hale as the Lord Captain! Get a place in the queue for a reasonable price!"

traits.locale_text: "Versäumt nicht die Gelegenheit, die gesegnete Brühe zu probieren, die auch der Lord Captain genossen hat! Stärkt Euch! Heilt Eure Krankheiten! Werdet so gesund wie der Lord Captain! Sichert Euch für einen vernünftigen Preis einen Platz in der Schlange!"

languages.text: « Ne loupez pas cette occasion unique de goûter au bouillon sacré {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! Il vous donnera des forces et guérira tous vos maux ! Pour une modique somme, vous serez aussi solide que Sa Seigneurie ! Faites la queue, il n'y en aura pas pour tout le monde ! »
languages.original_text: "Don't miss out on a chance to taste the blessed broth enjoyed by the Lord Captain! Boost your strength! Cure your ailments! Be as hale as the Lord Captain! Get a place in the queue for a reasonable price!"

traits.locale_text: « Ne loupez pas cette occasion unique de goûter au bouillon sacré {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! Il vous donnera des forces et guérira tous vos maux ! Pour une modique somme, vous serez aussi solide que Sa Seigneurie ! Faites la queue, il n'y en aura pas pour tout le monde ! »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ın afiyetle içtiği kutsanmış çorbayı tatma şansını kaçırmayın! Gücünüzü katlayın! Hastalıklarınıza şifa bulun! Tıpkı Lord Kaptan gibi siz de dinçleşin! Uygun bir fiyata sırada kendinize yer edinin!"
languages.original_text: "Don't miss out on a chance to taste the blessed broth enjoyed by the Lord Captain! Boost your strength! Cure your ailments! Be as hale as the Lord Captain! Get a place in the queue for a reasonable price!"
